title: Teen Rape Survivor Chased, Hacked To Death By Accused, His Brother In UP
selftext: A 19-year-old woman was hacked to death in broad daylight in Uttar Pradesh by two brothers, including the man accused of raping her. The killers - Ashok and Pawan Nishad - had been released on bail a few days before the brutal murder.
